title: WW Business Planning Analyst
summary: Imagine what you could do here. The people here at Apple don’t just create products —they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Apple’s Sales organization generates the revenue needed to fuel our ongoing development of products and services. This in turn, enriches the lives of hundreds of millions of people around the world. Our sales team, is in many ways, the face of Apple to our largest customers. Our WW Business Planning team is seeking an Analyst to play a critical role in supporting Apple's global Enterprise and Education strategic planning cadence and infrastructure. In this role, you will provide analytical support and develop insights to drive business decisions, working closely with senior leadership to ensure strategic imperatives are executed efficiently and effectively at scale. As a WW Business Planning Analyst, you will leverage your passion for data and proven business acumen to collaborate openly and help transform the way people work, teach, and learn globally.
description: In this role, you will: - Assist in the development and execution of long-term business strategies, as well as business cases for new initiatives and projects - Analyze key financial metrics and performance indicators to assess business performance - Conduct market research and analysis to inform strategic initiatives - Track and monitor key business performance metrics on a regular basis - Develop Keynote presentations for senior management and other stakeholders - Develop and maintain Tableau dashboards and other analytical tools to support business operations - Lead or support special projects and initiatives as assigned
preferred_qualifications: Background in Sales Operations, Sales Finance, Corporate Strategy, Management Consulting, or similar analytical/business intelligence field; Experience working with global teams to deliver complex initiatives across sales strategy and sales operations; Ability to define, extract, and manipulate data to build reports, data visualization dashboards, and translate insights into actionable results through storytelling; Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to articulate analysis clearly; Ability to aggregate information from multiple sources to formulate a cohesive strategy or direction; Strong organization skills and attention to detail; Ability to prioritize, manage, and advance multiple projects and deliver results in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment; Excellent collaboration and relationship building skills, including the ability to quickly establish trust, credibility, and influence across a variety of cross-functional and multi-directional partners
